articles.title: Emi Martinez comments on Aston Villa exit after Lionel Messi calls him 'one of the best'
articles.description: Aston Villa goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez has been called 'one of the best in the world' by Argentina teammate Lionel Messi
articles.content:
Lionel Messi has made it his personal mission to raise the profile of Aston Villa goalkeeper Emiliano Martinez.
Since Martinez took the reins as Argentina’s number one in the summer, La Albiceleste captain Messi has been full of praise for him.

articles.description: Argentina's corn export market remains "open" despite a new government policy that prioritizes crops that are already harvested over forward sales of the upcoming crop, the agriculture ministry said on Tuesday.

articles.title: Aston Villa could have yet another Emiliano Martinez worry after Argentina-Brazil comments
articles.description: Aston Villa's goalkeeper already has a busy schedule - and it could get even worse
articles.content:
Emiliano Martinez international commitments have been a source of regular concern for Aston Villa.

articles.title: UN panel says it can’t rule on climate case brought by Greta Thunberg
articles.description: The 15 activists, aged between eight and 17 at the time, had argued that France, Turkey, Brazil, Germany and Argentina had known about the risk of climate change for decades but failed to curb their carbon emissions.
articles.content:
A UN panel said it could not immediately rule on a complaint by Swedish teenager Greta Thunberg and others that state inaction on climate change violates children’s rights, adding that they should have taken the case to national courts first.
